column4: I want to use the i686 kernel , the k7 kernel is currently the operating one but i686 is installed.If i turn off 3d accelleration but typing in "nv" at driver in xorg.con the i686 kernel works fine...but when i follow the instructions for installing nvidia drivers it installs it on the old , k7 , kernel....How can i solve this?I want the i686 kernel , badly....
